textField.title:
Last week
you certainly kept up with your social circle,
textField.subTitle: but what about your muscles?

game.resp:
Didn't have time
to fit in any activity

textField.title:
Test your intellectual
agility
textField.subTitle:
A whole new week for brain crunching...
Are you ready to stimulate your intellectual agility?

textField.game: You have 1 minute to associate the pairs.

game.explain:
Imagine you have a 3-liter jug and a 5-liter jug.
You can fill them up, empty them out or pour water from one
into the other. How can you get precisely 4 liters of water?

help.explain: Remplissez le bidon de 5L et transvasez son contenu dans le bidon de 3L. Vous avez 2L dans le bidon de 5L
Videz le bidon de 3L puis transvasez les 2L dans ce dernier.
Add 1 liter to the small jug, 1 one liter less than the big one. 5 - 1 = 4, it's that simple!

bubble.text:
Depuis que vous
votre corps à

textField.title: Félicitations,
textField.subTitle:
vous avez bien travaillé. Mais ne vous arrêtez pas en si bon chemin…
Poursuivez vos efforts afin d’améliorer votre Quotient Jeunesse
et continuez régulièrement vos exercices toute la semaine pour progresser.

textField.title: Legal mentions
textField.text:
All information contained on this website is intended to be fun and is provided for entertainment and general educational information only, and shall not be treated as substitutes for professional medical advice and care.

If you have any concerns about your health, diet, lifestyle, or fitness routine, you should consult a healthcare professional.

This web site and its creators assume no responsibility for consequences resulting from the use of this website and information contained herein, and it expressly disclaims all liability for injury or DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, or CONSEQUENTIAL damages or LOST PROFITS arising out of use, reference to, reliance on, or performance of such information.

This web site is provided on an "as is", "as available" basis without warranties of any kind, express or implied.
